tool_description: This API provides on a quasi-daily basis, the amount of carbon dioxide (CO2) in the atmosphere from 2010.01.01 to the present. It is expressed as a mole fraction in dry air, parts per million (ppm).
title: Daily atmosphere  carbon dioxide concentration

api_list.name: Carbon dioxide endpoint
api_list.description: The response will be an object with no CORS resources enabled.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://daily-atmosphere-carbon-dioxide-concentration.p.rapidapi.com/api/co2-api"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "daily-atmosphere-carbon-dioxide-concentration.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

utterances.utterance: What is the current carbon dioxide concentration in the atmosphere?
Can you provide the latest CO2 levels in parts per million?
Tell me the atmospheric CO2 concentration for today.
I need the most recent data on carbon dioxide levels in the air.
What is the atmospheric CO2 concentration as of now?
Please give me the current parts per million of CO2 in the atmosphere.
Fetch the latest carbon dioxide concentration data.
What are the current levels of CO2 in the atmosphere?
Can you show me today's carbon dioxide concentration in ppm?
I want to know the current atmospheric CO2 levels.
